Reviews.Title: “Great location in the heart of Barcelona. A bit run down but does the job for the price.”

Reviews.Author: eyemouthboy
Reviews.Content: city centre basic budget apartment close city centre makes base seeing sights basic dont expect luxury lot noise busy street below chance sitting balcony chilling sunshine feeling apartments barcelona similar accomodation hotel handy location comfort

Reviews.Title: “Great location. Good value for money.”

Reviews.Content: visited barcelona 4 friends stayed 6 days booked apartment online arrived pick keys hotel located blocks 15 minutes walking deposit 300 euro pleasure walk inconvenient apartment experienced traveler expects class style service clean simple contemporary decor absolutely provide comfortable stay friends family las ramblas appartments iii location city center 2 blocks main square placa catalunya las rambla metro station urquinaona 50 steps palace catalan music corner boqueria market 57 minutes walking distance appartment kitchen cooking enjoyed dinner fresh fish vegetables apartment expected except cold water kitchen shower curtain missing excited city fun called visited manager im fix immidiately desk stuff friendly helpful enjoyed stay reccomend las ramblas appartments iii friends family
